body.name: Yoobure L Shaped Desk Gaming Desk with LED Strip & Power Outlet, Reversible L-Shaped Computer Desk with Storage Shelf & Drawer, Corner Desk with Storage Bag, 2 Person Home Office Desk, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 18 hrs 29 mins
features: 🚩【Reversible L Shape Desk】Looking for versatile home office desks that can adapt to your space and usage needs? Look no further than our l shaped desk with drawers! With a reversible design, the top hutch of the l desk can be fixed on the left or right side according to your specific needs, to maximize your limited space which is fairly suited for corner spaces.

✨【Gaming Table with Smart LED Light】Our L-shaped gaming desk with RGB LED lights creates more fun for gaming enthusiasts, which features over 60000 colors and 29 flashing modes via APP or remote control. Built-in music sync function can change the light color with the rhythm of sound and music, make your life chill. And with timer function, the LED lights will stay in the last mode when turned on. Choose your favorite color and mode, let the game begin!

★【Versatile & Practical】The 55.1"L*19.7"W*59.9"H writing desk with 2 large tabletops of different lengths can offer ample space for 3 monitors or other activities while providing extra display space for your books, etc. A great addition to your office, studio, living room, and more! Choose our l shaped desk with storage for a more comfortable and efficient experience.

⚡【4 AC outlets & 2 USB ports】Equipped with 4 AC outlets and 2 USB ports, the l shaped gaming desk provides fast charging for your work and gaming devices, fully meets the demands of your charging needs. Say goodbye to the hassle of finding power outlets around the room. Plus, a 6.5ft power cord allows you to place this small computer desk wherever you please.

👍【Ample Storage Space】In addition to 2 spacious desktops, the computer table has 1 large Non-woven drawer for concealed storage, plus a top hutch in an open shelf design that provides more storage and display space for files, books, printer paper, photos, and more. Storage bag of this corner desk for small space is suitable for storing scissors and other common items.

✅【Stability & Durability】The sturdy 0.8 IN steel frame and premium 0.6 IN wood board with scratch-proof, water-repellent surfaces ensure the long service time of the computer desk with drawers (Holds up to 500 lbs). Adjustable foot pads of this office table keep level and stable on uneven floors which further enhances stability. Elevate your comfort and efficiency to the next level.

💖【Assembling is A Breeze!】Clear and detailed instructions and numbered parts make assembling this computer desk l shaped as effortless as possible. Check out the assembly video on the page for added guidance. We offer 1 Year Warranty Service. Not satisfied, get a full refund at any time. If you have any problems, please feel free to contact us and our customer service team will reply within 24 hours.

More Thoughtful Details of the L-Shape Desk Fabric Drawer for Storage Large drawer with handle ideal for concealed storage Non-woven Storage Bag Keep desktop clean and organized by storing tapes and other common items Large Size Host Shelf The shelf in 23.2" height is suitable for most hosts, has excellent heat dissipation 3-grid Top Hutch With raised/open design, provides more space to organize storage and display
Create a productive, simple work space with the Yoobure L-shaped desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Seller and beautiful Desk!
reviews.reviewText: Desk is very good for the price and perfect for the conner and fell comfortable. The Vendor is great replace the wrong shipment first time with no question asked. Desk sturdy and was so easy to put together. The LED lights are a nice touch and very convenient AC plug so you can get phone charge within reach. I would definitely recommend this desk!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect corner desk!
reviews.reviewText: This L shaped desk looks fabulous in my office. Its sleek and modern and has transformed my office into a place I dont mind working. The room is smaller but this desk fits in there perfectly and I still have room to put other thing in there. There's lots of space on the desk to put a computer, laptop, books, and a printer. It even comes a cool light under the shelf. It's sturdy and well made. And it was easy to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is honestly the best desk I have ever had! It’s spacious, sturdy, and serves multiple purposes. I use it to charge multiple devices and the color changing lights are an awesome bonus! It was really easy to put together, I did it myself in less than 2 hours! I have already recommended it to multiple people and will continue to do so. Building my Lego have never felt more safe. It doesn’t wobble every time I bump into which is a huge plus !! And the price is great!! You can also put it together multiple ways to fit your space ! I’m extremely satisfied with this desk !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice desk for the price
reviews.reviewText: Let me start by saying I love this desk. It looks so nice and has plenty of space to put/display things on. My only problem was during assembly I had some trouble getting some of the screws to line up perfectly. However, a little extra effort on my part was enough to get the thing together. The desk is reversible, meaning you can assemble the overhead compartment and PC holder on either side according to your liking. I've been using it every day for about 4 months now and it is still completely sturdy and looks brand new. Very nice desk for the price-point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy 1 person set up
reviews.reviewText: This LShaped desk is a perfect fit for my laptop/printer/books/space to eat. It was easy for me as a female to put it together myself. The desk was packaged very securely & with good instructions. I did have a guy carry it upstairs for me while it was still in the box because it was to heavy for me that way but the actual pieces are quite light on their own, so putting it together alone wasn't a problem. It seems sturdy enough and the drawer is decent. The only problem is that the sticky on the back of the light strip doesn't seem to be strong enough & I had to use electrical tape to hold it up on both ends after a few days but otherwise the desk is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size and easy to assemble!!
reviews.reviewText: My office is now complete!!! Full disclosure, I didn't personally put the desk together, my fiance did, however, he said it was super easy and didn't take him long at all! I absolutely love it! The size is perfect for what I needed, and it feels sturdy, even after I filled it with all of my jewelry making stuff!The only complaint I have is with the LED lights that come with it. We went to put them up under the shelf, however, the sticky part is on the tape you peel off instead of the LED strip! Going to try some Velcro patches, hopefully that will get the strip to stay.I still give this desk a 5 star review, because really, I didn't buy it for the LED lights, they were just a bonus. The desk itself is beautiful, sturdy, a great size, and easy to assemble!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great desk for a great price.
reviews.reviewText: This desk was exactly what I was looking for and at a price that can’t be beat. The value here is very high in my opinion. Construction was pretty straightforward and took me about 45 minutes to build it alone. The only thing you will need that doesn’t come included is a Phillips head screwdriver. The best features for me is the shelf and built in power strip. I enjoy building Gundam models and collecting little knick-knacks so a shelf was high on my list of priorities when choosing a desk. The cubbies, along with the top shelf, offer the perfect amount of space for these things. The power strip fits snugly into the surface of the desk and comes with four outlets and two usb ports. Perfect for keeping cables nice and tidy.To keep things short, at this price point I couldn’t be happier with this desk. It was easy to assemble, had the features I was looking for, and is sturdy and seems to be good quality. I highly recommend if you’re in the market for a cheaper option desk for your home office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Assemble, Sturdy and Good Looking Desk
reviews.reviewText: After moving, we needed a new desk for the house. After looking around in different furniture sellers and online furniture stores, we finally resorted to Amazon, as we were struggling to find something we wanted within our budget (moving expenses can skyrocket really quick). I loved this piece but I was honestly a little bit worried, as the price was too good to be true.The desk was delivered extremely quick (arrived at the new place a day before we were in!, but that is my faul!). Assembling it was really easy as the instructions were very clear, and you kind of assemble different pieces of it, and then put it together. The desk is sturdy enough to handle some weight, and my weight, as I usually lean against it often. I personally love that I have enough space to have my legs comfortably under it, as it was a problem I had with previous desks.Definetely recommend to anyone looking for a similar desk, as it offers more value for the money as other options in the market.10/10.
